name: Kin no Buki Gin no Buki Wonder Ride Book

pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Saikou's $(l:saber/devices/seiken_saikou_driver)Seiken Saikou Driver$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Saikou's $(l:saber/riders/saikou#saikou)base form$(/l) and $(l:saber/riders/saikou#shadow)Saikou Shadow$(/l)
Obtained by using $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder Ride Books$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/sword_of_logos_book_analyzer)Sword of Logos Book Analyzer$(/l)
